Phytokeratine Repairing Shampoo - Imported (200 ml) Price: Rs.3800

Phytokeratine Repairing Shampoo 6. 7 oz (200 ml). Helps repair the internal structure of weakened damaged hair to restore its strength and shine. the hair feels stronger silkier and more supple. Botanical keratin injected deep into the hair fiber works to rebuild its internal architecture. Hyaluronic acid retains moisture inside the hair to ensure optimal hydration levels. Rice bran ceramides act like a real intercellular cement to fill in micro-fissures on the surface and smooth the cuticle down. Pomegranate extract with anti-free radicals and UV protection properties protects the fiber against environmental stresses. this conditioning treatment gently detangles and facilitates styling without weighing hair down. the internal substance of the hair fiber is restored. p
